Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your Limited Liability Company (LLC) order. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order:
Do not make any changes to the attached document as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Care Team. Print two (2) copies of the Certificate of Formation on white paper using black ink. Please do not use color ink. Please obtain signature(s) from all members/managers of your company where indicated on all copies. Please use black ink only. Mail the documents to our address listed below. Please note that we cannot accept faxes as the state office only accepts original signed documents.
Courier and USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 9900 Spectrum Drive Austin, TX 78717
LegalZoom cannot accept walk-in customers to our offices. Please follow the instructions above to return signed documents to us. We apologize for any inconvenience.
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
